'''Goldwine''' ({{TA|2619}} – {{TA|2699|n}}, aged 80 years) was the sixth [[King of Rohan]].

==History==
He was born during the rule of his great-grandfather [[Aldor]] the Old, and was aged 26, already a father, when Aldor finally died and the crown passed to Goldwine's grandfather [[Fréa]].

Goldwine became King at the death of his father [[Fréawine]] in Third Age 2680, when he was 61 years old. 

Goldwine died in 2699 after a rule of nineteen years. He was followed by his son [[Déor]].<ref>{{App|Mark}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Goldwine'' means "liberal and kindly prince" in [[Old English]].<ref name="RC">{{HM|RC}}, 643</ref><ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=https://bosworthtoller.com/17382|articlename=gold-wine|accessed=24 July 2025}}</ref> It consists of the elements ''gold'' ("gold")<ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=https://bosworthtoller.com/17348|articlename=gold|accessed=24 July 2025}}</ref> and ''wine'' ("friend")<ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=https://bosworthtoller.com/35887|articlename=wine|accessed=24 July 2025}}</ref>.<ref name="RC"/>
